00014 huffman_table caen_channel_huffman;
00015 BOOL should_compress_caen = TRUE;
00016 BOOL should_strip_trailing_edge = TRUE;
00017 BOOL should_strip_r1 = TRUE;
00018 
00019 void caen_optimize()
00020 {
00021   huffman_optimize_tree(&caen_channel_huffman);
00022   save_huffman("/Compression/Lossless/CAEN/Huffman/Channel", &caen_channel_huffman);
00023 }
00024 
00025 void caen_load()
00026 {
00027   huffman_init_default(&caen_channel_huffman, 129);
00028   load_huffman("/Compression/Lossless/CAEN/Huffman/Channel", &caen_channel_huffman);
00029 
00030   int size = sizeof(BOOL);
00031   db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Compression/Lossless/CAEN/Enabled", &should_compress_caen, 
00032     &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00033 
00034   size = sizeof(BOOL);
00035   db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Compression/Lossless/CAEN/Strip trailing edge", 
00036     &should_strip_trailing_edge, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00037 
00038   size = sizeof(BOOL);
00039   db_get_value(hDB, 0, "/Compression/Lossless/CAEN/Strip R1",
00040     &should_strip_r1, &size, TID_BOOL, TRUE);
00041 }
00042 
00043 int encode_caen(caen_word * input, int input_size, io_buffer * output, 
00044   int *uncompressed_size_p)
00045 {
00046   // Encode CAEN TDC data, which are in the following format:
00047   // 0 | channel (7 bits) | Start (1 bit) | 00 | Edge (1 bit) | time (20 bits)
00048   // 
00049   // 1. Optionally, trailing edges are discarded.
00050   // 2. An extended channel number, formed from the channel, start, 
00051   // and edge bits, is Huffman coded.
00052   // 3. Successive differences between times are constructed and encoded
00053   // with a variable number of bits.
00054 
00055   int strip_trailing_edge = should_strip_trailing_edge;
00056   int strip_r1 = should_strip_r1;
00057   int prev_time = 0;
00058   int uncompressed_size = 0;
00059 
00060   io_buffer_put(output, strip_trailing_edge, 1);
00061   io_buffer_put(output, strip_r1, 1);
00062 
00063   for (int i = 0; i < input_size; i++) {
00064 
00065     int channel = input[i].channel;
00066     if (input[i].r2 != 0 || input[i].start) {
00067 #if 0
00068       printf("in datum %d : r1 %d channel %d start %d r2 %d edge %d time %d\n",
00069         i, input[i].r1, input[i].channel, input[i].start, input[i].r2,
00070         input[i].edge, input[i].time);
00071 #endif
00072       channel = 128;
00073     } else if (strip_trailing_edge && input[i].edge == 0) {
00074       continue;
00075     }
00076 
00077     huffman_put_symbol(&caen_channel_huffman, output, channel);
00078 
00079     if(channel == 128) {
00080       int verbatim = *((int *) &input[i]);
00081       io_buffer_put(output, (verbatim >> 16) & 0xffff, 16);
00082       io_buffer_put(output, verbatim & 0xffff, 16);
00083     } else {
00084 
00085       if(!strip_r1) {
00086         io_buffer_put(output, input[i].r1, 1);
00087       }
00088 
00089       if (!strip_trailing_edge) {
00090         io_buffer_put(output, input[i].edge, 1);
00091       }
00092 
00093       int time_diff = input[i].time - prev_time;
00094 
00095       if (time_diff < 32 && time_diff >= -32) {
00096         io_buffer_put(output, 0, 1);
00097         io_buffer_put(output, time_diff & 0x3f, 6);
00098       } else if (time_diff < 512 && time_diff >= -512) {
00099         io_buffer_put(output, 2, 2);
00100         io_buffer_put(output, time_diff & 0x3ff, 10);
00101       } else {
00102         io_buffer_put(output, 3, 2);
00103         io_buffer_put(output, time_diff & 0xfffff, 20);
00104       }
00105 
00106       prev_time = input[i].time;
00107     }
00108 
00109     uncompressed_size++;
00110   }
00111 
00112   *uncompressed_size_p = uncompressed_size;
00113 
00114   return flush_output_buffer(output);
00115 }
00116 
00117 int caen_compress(caen_word * input, int input_size, unsigned char *output, int userParam)
00118 {
00119   input_size /= sizeof(caen_word);
00120 
00121   rle_bits_setup();
00122 
00123   io_buffer output_buffer;
00124 
00125   // reserve space for size of uncompressed data (may be different from
00126   // input size, since some hits may be stripped)
00127   int *uncompressed_size_p = (int *) output;
00128   output += sizeof(int);
00129 
00130   // reserve space for the size of the compressed data
00131   int *compressed_time_size_p = (int *) output;
00132   output += sizeof(int);
00133 
00134   // compress times
00135   start_output_buffer(&output_buffer, output);
00136   int compressed_time_size =
00137       encode_caen(input, input_size, &output_buffer, uncompressed_size_p);
00138   output += compressed_time_size;
00139 
00140   // store size of compressed times
00141   *compressed_time_size_p = compressed_time_size;
00142 
00143   return compressed_time_size + 2 * sizeof(int);
00144 }
00145 
00146 static int sign_extend(int in, int bits)
00147 {
00148   int sign_bit = (1 << (bits-1));
00149   if(in & sign_bit) {
00150     return in | ~(sign_bit - 1);
00151   } else {
00152     return in;
00153   }
00154 }
00155 
00156 void decode_caen(io_buffer * input, caen_word * output)
00157 {
00158   int strip_trailing_edge = io_buffer_get(input, 1);
00159   int strip_r1 = io_buffer_get(input, 1);
00160 
00161   int prev_time = 0;
00162 
00163   int i = 0;
00164   while (1) {
00165 
00166     int channel = huffman_get_symbol(&caen_channel_huffman, input);
00167 
00168     if (channel < 0) {
00169       break;
00170     }
00171 
00172     if (channel == 128) {
00173       int v1 = io_buffer_get(input, 16);
00174       int v2 = io_buffer_get(input, 16);
00175 
00176       int verbatim = v2 | (v1 << 16);
00177       output[i] = *((caen_word *) &verbatim);
00178     } else {
00179       output[i].start = 0;
00180       output[i].channel = channel;
00181 
00182       if(!strip_r1) {
00183         output[i].r1 = io_buffer_get(input, 1);
00184       } else {
00185         output[i].r1 = 0;
00186       }
00187       output[i].r2 = 0;
00188 
00189       if (!strip_trailing_edge) {
00190         output[i].edge = io_buffer_get(input, 1);
00191       } else {
00192         output[i].edge = 1;
00193       }
00194 
00195       int time_length_flag1 = io_buffer_get(input, 1);
00196       int time_diff;
00197       if (time_length_flag1 == 0) {
00198         time_diff = io_buffer_get(input, 6);
00199         time_diff = sign_extend(time_diff, 6);
00200       } else {
00201         int time_length_flag2 = io_buffer_get(input, 1);
00202         if (time_length_flag2 == 0) {
00203           time_diff = io_buffer_get(input, 10);
00204           time_diff = sign_extend(time_diff, 10);
00205         } else {
00206           time_diff = io_buffer_get(input, 20);
00207           time_diff = sign_extend(time_diff, 20);
00208         }
00209       }
00210 
00211       output[i].time = (prev_time + time_diff) & 0xfffff;
00212       prev_time = output[i].time;
00213     }
00214 
00215     i++;
00216   }
00217 }
00218 
00219 int caen_expand(unsigned char *input, int input_size, caen_word * output, int userParam)
00220 {
00221   // 
00222   // Uncompress the data produced by caen_compress().
00223   // 
00224 
00225   rle_bits_setup();
00226 
00227   // Get uncompressed data size
00228   int *uncompressed_size_p = (int *) input;
00229   int uncompressed_size = *uncompressed_size_p;
00230   input += sizeof(int);
00231   input_size -= sizeof(int);
00232 
00233   // Get size of compressed time data
00234   int *compressed_time_size_p = (int *) input;
00235   int compressed_time_size = *compressed_time_size_p;
00236   input += sizeof(int);
00237   input_size -= sizeof(int);
00238 
00239   // Uncompress times
00240   io_buffer input_buffer;
00241   start_input_buffer(&input_buffer, input);
00242   decode_caen(&input_buffer, output);
00243   input += compressed_time_size;
00244   input_size -= compressed_time_size;
00245 
00246   return uncompressed_size * sizeof(caen_word);
00247 }
